title: Angelina Jolie is joined by her teen daughters Zahara and Shiloh at the Maleficent premiere in Rome
text:
She's been busy on the publicity circuit, as she promotes her new Disney movie Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil around the globe.

And Angelina Jolie, 44, stepped out in style on Monday, when she attended the film's European premiere in Rome, alongside her co-star Michelle Pfeiffer, 61.

The Oscar-winning actress opted to make it a family affair, bringing her daughters Zahara, 14, and Shiloh, 13, with her onto the red carpet.

It's a family affair: Angelina Jolie arrived at the Rome premiere of her new movie Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil with her daughters (L-R) Shiloh, 13, and Zahara, 14

And while Angelina and her co-star Michelle provided the star power for the film's big unveiling, it was the actress's offspring who stole the show.

Zahara looked stylish in a halterneck midnight green gown, while she wore her curly raven tresses in an updo and sported glittering drop earrings.

Shiloh displayed her own flair for fashion in a black jacket with gold and silver stripes, which she teamed with black trousers and a pair of Converse shoes.

Screen stars: The Oscar-winning actress, 44, posed alongside her costar Michelle Pfeiffer, 61

Stealing the show: While Angelina and her co-star Michelle provided the star power for the film's big unveiling, it was the actress's offspring who stole the show

Showing that it was her big night, Angelina wowed in an off-shoulder floor-length glittering black gown, which featured a sweetheart neckline.

With her chestnut brown locks falling beyond her shoulders, she accessorised with a pair of sparkling drop earrings, while her natural beauty was highlighted with a flattering palette of makeup.

Appearing to be in her natural habitat as she commanded the attention red carpet of photographers, the star hugged her adorable daughters as they posed together.

Not to be outdone, Michelle looked sensational as she hit the exclusive event in a deeply plunging blue velvet gown featuring full sleeves.

Stylish: Zahara looked stylish in a halterneck midnight green gown, while she wore her curly raven tresses in an updo and sported glittering drop earrings

Flair for fashion: Shiloh displayed her own flair for fashion in a black jacket with gold and silver stripes, which she teamed with black trousers and a pair of Converse shoes

Her golden locks framed her face in a series of impeccably coiffed curls, while large statement earrings served as her main accessories.

While Zahara and Shiloh joined their mother, not seen at the event were Angelina's other children - Maddox, 18; Pax, 15, and 11-year-old twins Vivienne and Knox.

For several years, Angelina raised the children with her former husband Brad Pitt, 55, who she wed in August 2014 after almost a decade together.

However, their relationship came to an end just two years later, when Angelina filed for divorce from Brad.

Screen star Brad is the biological father of Shiloh, Vivienne, and Knox, while he adopted Maddox, Pax and Zahara.

Pucker up: Angelina greeted her glamorous co-star with a friendly kiss as she made her arrival

Talk: As cameras flashed, the screen stars enjoyed a private chat while embracing one another

So happy to see you: The stars stretched their arms out to greet one another on the red carpet

Angelina's outing at the premiere came hours after she enjoyed a shopping spree with three of her six children, Shiloh, and Vivienne and Knox.

The actress cut a typically low-key figure in a form-fitting navy jumper with a pair of chic black trousers during the outing with her brood.

Making the most of their day out, the family are believed to have enjoyed a trip to the museum before venturing into both a bookshop and a toy shop.

Angelina appeared to have bought Shiloh a toy gun set called Set De Chasse, which includes two targets, a pigeon, and a rabbit, and a toy shotgun.

Just hours earlier, Angelina was back at work as she headed to Hotel De La Ville in Rome for another photocall alongside co-star Michelle.

Very busy: The co-stars' glamorous night on the carpet rounded out a busy day of promotion

Hollywood glamour: The Oscar-winning actress wowed in an off-shoulder floor-length glittering black gown, which featured a sweetheart neckline

Flattering palette: Actress Angelina highlighted her beauty with a flattering palette of makeup

Swapping her usual trademark black outfits for something a bit brighter, Angelina looked incredible wearing a long purple top as she giggled with Michelle.

The number was unusual and had petal-shaped layers and spaghetti straps and she flashed her various inkings as she arrived.

Disney beginners may not recall that Maleficent is the evil fairy in the classic 1959 animation Sleeping Beauty, and that Angelina played her in a 2014 live-action film.

Just five years on, Jolie is playing her again in Mistress Of Evil, still wearing black horns, fighting fairies and sorting out her conflicted maternal feelings towards sweet Princess Aurora (Elle Fanning).

Enduring beauty: Not to be outdone, Michelle looked sensational as she hit the exclusive event in a deeply plunging blue velvet gown featuring full sleeves

Golden locks: Michelle's golden locks framed her face in a series of impeccably coiffed curls, while large statement earrings served as her main accessories

This time she has competition from the neighbouring Queen Ingrith (Pfeiffer) who causes a rift between our anti-heroine and Aurora, when her son Prince Phillip returns to the kingdom and proposes to the Princess.

Unbeknown to Aurora, Ingrith is plotting to use their marriage to divide humans and fairies forever, and it is up to Maleficent to try and stop the impending war.

Chiwetel Ejiofor joins the cast as the leader of an army of fairies just like Maleficent, while Harris will replace Brenton Thwaites as Prince Phillip.

The original 2014 film grossed a whopping $758million worldwide, and brought another success addition to Disney's series of dark fairy tales.
